title: Article Writer Settings
description: Global settings for article writer plugin including companion project defaults and article limits

article_limits.description: Hard limits for article content. These limits apply to ALL articles regardless of content_type.

max_words.description: Maximum word count for article content (excluding frontmatter and code blocks). Articles exceeding this limit MUST be condensed while maintaining quality, flow, and author voice.

companion_project_defaults.description: Default settings for each companion project type. Article-specific values override these.
Default values for a companion project type

technologies.description: Default technologies/tools for this companion project type

has_tests.description: Whether companion projects of this type should include tests by default

path.description: Default folder path for the companion project

scaffold_command.description: Command to create the base project (e.g., composer create-project laravel/laravel code)

post_scaffold.description: Commands to run after scaffolding (e.g., install test framework)

verification.description: Commands to verify the companion project is complete and working

install_command.description: Command to install dependencies (e.g., composer install, npm install)

setup_commands.description: Commands to run after install (e.g., php artisan migrate)

run_command.description: Command to start the application (e.g., php artisan serve)

test_command.description: Command to run tests (e.g., php artisan test)

success_indicators.description: What indicates each verification step succeeded

manual_checks.description: Manual verification steps for non-code companion projects

notes.description: Additional notes for this companion project type
